vote.title: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 5 to increase the service contract for hosting maintenance, and support of ESO Visual Fire Software used by Fire-Rescue for the  Department of Information and Technology Services not to exceed $168,223.00, from $841,115.00 to $1,009,338.00; and (2) execution of a two-year service contract for continuous hosting, maintenance, and support of ESO Visual Fire software used by the Dallas Fire-Rescue Department for the Department of Information and Technology Services in an amount not to exceed $362,100.01 - ESO Solutions, Inc., sole source - Total not to exceed $530,323.01 - Financing:  Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 5 to increase the service contract for hosting maintenance, and support of ESO Visual Fire Software used by Fire-Rescue for the  Department of Information and Technology Services not to exceed $168,223.00, from $841,115.00 to $1,009,338.00; and (2) execution of a two-year service contract for continuous hosting, maintenance, and support of ESO Visual Fire software used by the Dallas Fire-Rescue Department for the Department of Information and Technology Services in an amount not to exceed $362,100.01 - ESO Solutions, Inc., sole source - Total not to exceed $530,323.01 - Financing:  Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
